sentences.sContent: Fortunately, they can be beaten, as indicated by the liberation of the Procyon people from these malevolent, self centered, self-serving... life draining entities.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fortunately, they can be beaten, as indicated by the liberation of the Procyon people from these malevolent, self centered, self-serving... life draining entities.
sentences.sCn: 幸运的是，它们被击败，我们被南河三人从这些恶毒的、自私自利的、以自我为中心的......生命枯竭的实体手中解放。

synos.tran: 恶毒的；有恶意的；坏心肠的

words.tran: 恶意的；恶毒的；蓄意的；怀恨的

trans.tranCn: 有恶意的, 坏心肠的
trans.tranOther: a malevolent person wants to harm other people
